tool_description: Returns age calculation based on the requested date.

api_list.name: Age Calculator
api_list.description: Calculates age based on the requested date. Accepts different formats and time zones.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which the age is to be calculated. Acceptable formats include: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, MMDDYYYY, MM-DD-YYYY.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Optional: Default time zone is US/Eastern. To get the correct age based on your local time, you can select your timezone. Use the /timezone service to see all available time zones.

api_list.name: Usable Time Zones
api_list.description: Call this endpoint to view the current endpoint. Find the appropriate time zone for your location.
